v8:item.v8:content: Electronic document exchange with the bank
Group payment orders to be sent
Payment orders being processed by the bank
Group payment orders to be processed
Payment orders in processing command group
Payment orders in processing command group
Request a statement for the period
Group comment open the electronic documents exchange settings
Group comment open the electronic documents exchange settings
Remote service of "Sberbank Online" through a web-client is not possible.

Settings.QueryText: SELECT EDAttachedFiles.CreationDate AS SendingDate, EDAttachedFiles.Ref AS BankStatement, EDAttachedFiles.EDAgreement FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles WHERE EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.BankStatement) AND Not EDAttachedFiles.DeletionMark

SELECT EDStates.ObjectReference.Counterparty AS Recipient, EDStates.ObjectReference.Number AS Number, EDStates.ObjectReference.Date AS Date, EDStates.ObjectReference.CounterpartyAccount AS RecipientAccount, EDStates.ObjectReference.CompanyAccount AS CompanyAccount, EDAttachedFiles.DocumentAmount AS DocumentAmount, EDAttachedFiles.AdditionalInformation AS PaymentDestination, EDAttachedFiles.Ref AS ElectronicDocument, EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus AS EDStatus, EDAttachedFiles.EDAgreement FROM InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles ON EDStates.ElectronicDocument = EDAttachedFiles.Ref WHERE (EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.ExpectedPerformance) OR EDStates.EDVersionState = VALUE(Enum.EDVersionsStates.NotificationAboutReceivingExpected)) AND EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.PaymentOrder)

SELECT EDAttachedFiles.Ref AS ElectronicDocument, EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus AS Status, EDAttachedFiles.CreationDate, EDAttachedFiles.EDAgreement FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles WHERE (EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.QueryStatement) OR EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.BankStatement))

SELECT EDAttachedFiles.Ref AS ElectronicDocument, EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus AS Status, EDAttachedFiles.CreationDate, EDAttachedFiles.EDAgreement FROM Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles WHERE (EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.QueryStatement) OR EDAttachedFiles.EDKind = VALUE(Enum.EDKinds.BankStatement)) AND Not EDAttachedFiles.EDStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDStatuses.Processed)
